item.description: public function getUserInfoById($id) { $this->db->select( '*' ); $this->db->where( 'id', $id ); $q = $this->db->get( 'clients_web' ); return $q->row(); } public function getAllUpload() { $this->db->select('*'); $this->db->from('user_upload'); $this->db->order_by("id", "desc"); $query=$this->db->get(); $attachments = $query->result_array(); $r = []; foreach ($attachments as $value) { $id = explode(',', $value['attachments']); $this->db->select('*'); $this->db->from('attachments'); $this->db->where_in('id', $id); $value['file_list'] = $this->db->get(); $value['file_list'] = $value['file_list']->result_array(); $value['user_details'] = $this->getUserInfoById($value['clients_web_id']); $r[] = $value; } // echo json_encode(); // echo json_encode($r); return $r; }
